entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beaver Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Creek Airport 3:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -39.1°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -43.0°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 58 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 38. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
